ComicInfo.Summary:
HIT-GIRL'S IN CANADA.
On the second stop of her crime-fighting world tour, Mindy is locked, loaded, and ready to seriously mess up some Canadians. JEFF LEMIRE and EDUARDO RISSO take on MARK MILLAR's psychotic, 12-year-old Hit-Girl as she unravels a drug trafficking operation in the frozen northâ€”and leaves a trail of blood in her wake.
